Sequence Information.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from SARS-CoV spike protein)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.15184046]HIV-luc/SARS pseudotyped virus:inhibition of virus infection in  293T cells(EC50=0.14 μM);SARS-CoV(wild-type):inhibition of virus infection in 293T cells(EC50=3.68 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: soluble synthesized HR1, HR2 or homologues can bind the exposed HR1 or HR2 region and block the formation of the six-helix bundle, thus inhibiting virus fusion with the target cell.

Literature.Title: Suppression of SARS-CoV entry by peptides corresponding to heptad regions on spike glycoprotein.
Literature.Author: Yuan K, Yi L, Chen J, Qu X, Qing T, Rao X, Jiang P, Hu J, Xiong Z, Nie Y, Shi X, Wang W, Ling C, Yin X, Fan K, Lai L, Ding M, Deng H.
